If you’re a data analyst at heart, this role is for you! because you’ll be mining insights from the sea of data, building data products, and designing experiments with the ability to see the real-time impact of your contribution. About The Team

The Shared Consumer Platform team will involve two teams, including Campaign Management and GoTo Passport. The Campaign Management team is responsible for distribution of communication channels for campaigns across Tokopedia which will include both internal and external channels such as In App Pop Up, Push Notification, Email, Whatsapp, SMS, and Notification Center. We enable users to get information regarding the latest campaign and interaction throughout the Tokopedia platform, based on their user behaviors. On expanding it, we’re also going to extend this capabilities to make the notification behavior to not include users’ action in Tokopedia but based on Gojek as well, creating a seamless experience for cross promotional campaign across GoTo platform.

The GoTo Passport profile team is responsible for the common profile for a person/user which connects all of their GoTo accounts/experiences together. We enable customers to sign up easily across different GoTo applications with the least friction and also empower them to update their personal information via a common profile management experience - cutting across all the apps. For example, gone are the days when users had to update their contact details separately in each of the GoTo Apps. In addition, we are a key enabler for SSO (Single sign-on) login across different GoTo apps, and making the sign-up process easy across apps - further reducing friction in how easily users can enjoy access to different services like shopping, mobility, food delivery, payments etc.
